channel.title: What the hell? Why is everyone all of a sudden playing minecraft?
channel.description: Like a month ago I've never even heard of it. Now I'm hearing about it all the time. I know what it is, but why is everyone all of a sudden playing it?

item.title: What the hell? Why is everyone all of a sudden playing minecraft?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Drugs, shit.
It’s exams time here, and I’m playing eight fucking hours a day.
Really addicting! The more you play the better it is, because you get more to do and you have more resources!

Read full topic
item.source: What the hell? Why is everyone all of a sudden playing minecraft?

item.title: What the hell? Why is everyone all of a sudden playing minecraft?
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

I play it for about 3-4 hours, then get bored, then come back the next day.

It’s like drugs, seriously.

Read full topic

item.title: What the hell? Why is everyone all of a sudden playing minecraft?
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nts253 Anc13nts253
item.description:
@Anc13nts253 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:8, topic:376633”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=472558.msg3455968#msg3455968 date=1294029850]
It’s because there’s a server now.
[/quote][quote author=The Soul link=topic=472558.msg3455989#msg3455989 date=1294030802]
The community server definitely sparked the growth here.
[/quote]Yup.

Trust me, it gets VERY addicting.

The problem is we have some major griefers on this forum, because a lot of members are immature.[/quote]

I quit because of that today some kid names thepronoob wrecked my house in the sky which took me a couple hours to make, but its w\e

Read full topic

[/quote][quote author=The Soul link=topic=472558.msg3455989#msg3455989 date=1294030802]
The community server definitely sparked the growth here.
[/quote]Yup.

Trust me, it gets VERY addicting.

The problem is we have some major griefers on this forum, because a lot of members are immature.[/quote]

Ive never played the game so I can’t really help, but why don’t you just hack the game add some commands or w/e and give people some power to they can help you keep the server under control…

item.title: What the hell? Why is everyone all of a sudden playing minecraft?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:3, topic:376633”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=472558.msg3455962#msg3455962 date=1294029586]
It’s addicting, very addicting.

4:40AM still playing it, I’ve fucked my sleeping pattern up. Haven’t seen daylight in days.
[/quote]

But wasn’t it just as addicting a month ago? What’s the huge craze about it all of a sudden?[/quote]

I played it a month ago, but I couldn’t get into it. Now my friends play it I can.

Read full topic
